DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study investigate whether diet rich rye fiber wholegrain rye , compare refined wheat , part hypocaloric diet lead large weight loss lower body fat content 12 week intervention . Furthermore study investigate effect appetite potential underlying mechanism difference weight loss body fat reduction .
DOC.brief_title: High Fiber Rye Foods Weight Body Fat Reduction
DOC.criteria: BMI 2735 kg/m2 Hb≥120g/l Serum thyroid stimulate hormone ( TSH ) ≤4.00 mIU/L Plasma low density lipoprotein cholesterol < 5.3 mmol/L Plasma triglycerides < 1.80 mmol/L Signed informed consent Freezer capacity 2 week bread provision Blood donation participation clinical study blood sample within 30 day prior screen visit throughout study Unable complete satisfactorily 3day weight food record screen visit 2 . Unable lose 0.5 kg runin period men woman menstruation run period Increased body weight , despite report adherence dietary intake woman menstruation runin period . Using nicotine product daily basis ( incl . chew gum , patch , snus etc . ) Using ecigarettes ( regardless nicotine content ) Following weight reduction program follow one last 6 month prior visit 1 Diastolic blood pressure 105 mm Hg visit 1 Systolic blood pressure 160 mm visit 1 History stomach gastrointestinal condition ( Inflammatory bowel disease , Crohn 's disease , malabsorption , colostomy , bowel resection , gastric bypass surgery etc . ) More 10 hour physical activity per week History heart failure heart attack within 1 year prior screen Have type I diabetes Receiving pharmacological treatment type II diabetes ( treatment base life style intervention acceptable , long compatible study protocol ) Previous gastrointestinal surgery Thyroid disorder History drug alcohol abuse Stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) within 1 year prior screen Consumption drug aim weight management drug affect body weight degree consider unsuitable study participation responsible physician ( included list allowed/disallowed medication ) Pregnant lactate wish become pregnant period study . Food allergy intolerance Vegetarian ( due standardize meal appetite measurement ) Unable understand write spoken Swedish Lack suitability participation trial , reason , judge medical doctor PI .
